United States Court of Appeals
                      For the First Circuit
                      ____________________


No. 00-1396
No. 00-1405

                          UNITED STATES

                    Appellee/Cross-Appellant,

                               v.

                      CHRISTOPHER R. WALKER

              Defendant, Appellant/Cross-Appellee.

                      ____________________


                          ERRATA SHEET


     The opinion of this Court issued on December 19, 2000, is
amended as follows:


    On page 3, line 21, delete:
         "$8,269"
       and replace it with:
         "$8,369"


    On page 16, line 11, delete:
         "they possessed"
       and replace it with:
         "it possessed"
